Name: Pedro Collins
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda, lightly stir and serve with straws.
Review: This rum-based Tom Collins is basically a long Daiquiri with soda.
History: See the history of the Collins cocktail on our Tom Collins page.
Nutrition: One serving of Pedro Collins contains 177 calories
